newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Luxembourg Banque UCL to be called Fortis Bank.
newsitem.headline: Luxembourg Banque UCL to be called Fortis Bank.

text.p: Luxembourg's Banque UCL SA, a unit of the Belgian-Dutch bancassurance group Fortis is to be renamed Fortis Bank Luxembourg from January 1, 1997, a Fortis spokesman said on Thursday.
Banque UCL is controlled by Belgium's ASLK-CGER bank, in which Fortis holds 49.5 percent. Fortis is itself 50/50 owned by Fortis AG and Fortis Amev NV.
